scan

public ChipScanner.ScanParameters scan(org.bukkit.block.Block signBlock,
                                       org.bukkit.material.MaterialData inputBlockType,
                                       org.bukkit.material.MaterialData outputBlockType,
                                       org.bukkit.material.MaterialData interfaceBlockType)
                                throws ChipScanner.ChipScanException
Scans the chip structure starting from the sign block.

Parameters:
signBlock - The sign block of the scanned chip.
Returns:
A ScanParameters object describing the chip structure.
Throws:
ChipScanner.ChipScanException - if the structure is not a valid chip.
